description: Scenario with similar endof-century temperature impact to VLLO, but with less aggressive near-term mitigation and large reliance on net negative emissions, resulting in a higher overshoot.
name: Very Low Scenario after High Overshoot
experiment_description: Scenario with similar endof-century temperature impact to VLLO, but with less aggressive near-term mitigation and large reliance on net negative emissions, resulting in a higher overshoot.
